FAQ.Label: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
FAQ.LabelContact:
Don't answer your question?
contact us at contact@yigim.az

Question1.Label: What is YIĞIM?
Question1.Answer: YIĞIM is a comprehensive payment processing platform that provides tailored solutions for businesses across various industries.

Question2.Label: Which payment methods do you support?
Question2.Answer: We support all major payment methods including credit cards, bank transfers, digital wallets, and local payment solutions.

Question3.Label: Who can use YIĞIM?
Question3.Answer: YIĞIM is designed for businesses of all sizes, from startups to enterprise-level companies across various industries.

Question4.Label: How long does integration take?
Question4.Answer: Integration typically takes 1-2 weeks depending on your specific requirements and existing infrastructure.

Question5.Label: Is YIĞIM secure?
Question5.Answer: Yes, YIĞIM employs industry-leading security measures including PCI DSS compliance and advanced encryption protocols.

Question6.Label: Do you offer customer support?
Question6.Answer: We provide 24/7 customer support through multiple channels including phone, email, and live chat.

Question7.Label: How are fees calculated?
Question7.Answer: Our fees are transparent and competitive, calculated based on transaction volume and the specific services you use.

Question8.Label: Which banks are you integrated with?
Question8.Answer: We're integrated with all major banks in Azerbaijan and have partnerships with international banking networks.

Product1.Label: All-In-One Aggregator Service
Product1.SubLabel: With just one integration, you now can simplify your whole payment process.
Product1.Description: This product is fully developed by YIĞIM’s in-house team. The ‘All-in-One’ solution brings together almost every payment method in one place. As a merchant, you would need only ONE integration, your billing system can easily connect to multiple channels — from cash payments at terminals to cashless options like mobile payments.

Product2.Label: Internet - Acquiring / E-Comm Solution
Product2.SubLabel: Reliable payments for your business: Even if one processing center experiences issues, transactions continue smoothly, with a 99.9% success rate.
Product2.Description: Developed entirely by YIĞIM’s in-house team, this integrated payment gateway supports cards for online stores and apps, ensures the highest transaction success rates, and protects customer data with advanced encryption and tokenization.

Product3.Label: Link Payment +
Product3.SubLabel: With our comprehensive payment system, you can send secure payment links via SMS or WhatsApp, allowing instant payments — no website required
Product3.Description: One of YIĞIM's own flagship products - your comprehensive payment management system which enables an effortless payment for your customers & consumers and a full tracking of transactions for you. To further simplify collection of funds for you, we integrated a feature that enables you to simply send a link that will directly lead to the payment page. Easy, seamless, and secure.

Product4.Label: Fast Invoice Payment
Product4.SubLabel: The smart SMS reminders with built-in payment options make payments effortless. Your customers pays on time while your workload drops.
Product4.Description: YIĞIM's own product that helps you to get your payments on time. This is a solution for accelerating invoice payments and reducing late payment risks. We solve slow, inconvenient payments by replacing SMS reminders with smart links to pre-filled payment pages.
